personalInfo.name: Abdullah Robin
personalInfo.title: Full Stack .Net Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full stack developer with expertise in building responsive web applications using modern technologies. I love solving complex problems and creating clean, efficient code.
personalInfo.about: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating robust applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and other cutting-edge technologies. I'm dedicated to writing clean, maintainable code and constantly expanding my knowledge in the ever-evolving world of web development.

experience.description: Customized and maintained Optimizely Configured Commerce (B2B) Product, collaborating with cross-functional international teams. Engineered a script to accelerate product upgrades, reducing upgrade time by 35%. Led code reviews to uphold best practices and coding standards.

Implemented Socket.IO for a persistent connection manager. Managed edge cases like lost connections, automatic re-connections, and real-time data synchronization. Developed skills in real-time data handling and troubleshooting in a fast-paced environment.

Worked as a Senior full-stack developer mainly in .Net Core, Java Spring, Angular, TypeScript. Led development teams and guided their career growth. Participated in client meetings, collected requirements, analyzed system needs, and prioritized tasks. Handled database design, built complex queries, and analyzed technical problems to design solutions.

Worked as a full-stack developer mainly in .Net Core, Java Spring, Angular. Practiced agile methodologies for improving software quality at each release. Initialized projects from scratch using design principles and standard coding conventions. Created highly readable, clean and easily maintainable source code.

Developed software for clients while completing my degree. Successfully delivered and deployed three projects built with ASP.Net web and ASP.NET WPF. One project expanded to multiple development phases as new requirements emerged.
